product_name: Pearl Izumi Infinity Split Shorts - Men's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: The men's Infinity Split Shorts from Pearl Izumi feature a split hem that lets your legs move unhindered. Outer shorts made of 100% polyester wick moisture, dry fast and offer UPF 50+ sun protection. Minerale-polyester liner brief dries 50% faster than ordinary polyester, offering evaporative cooling and odor resistance. Minerale technology will not wash off or wear out; simply wash the shorts to renew their performance qualities. Elastic waistband with drawcord secures fit. Rear zippered pocket stores extras. The semifitted Pearl Izumi Infinity shorts are not too tight and not too loose. Closeout.
